title: Black Christmas (1974 Horror) Directed by Bob Clark

sources.title: Black Christmas (1974 Horror) Directed by Bob Clark
sources.description:
Have yourself a scary little Christmas...Not at all like the ones you used to know.

Director: Bob Clark
Writer: Roy Moore
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Thriller

Main Cast:
Olivia Hussey as Jess
Keir Dullea as Peter
Margot Kidder as Barb
John Saxon as Lt. Fuller
Marian Waldman as Mrs. MacHenry (Mrs. Mac)
Andrea Martin as Phyl
James Edmond as Mr. Harrison
Douglas McGrath as Sergeant Nash
Art Hindle as Chris
Lynne Griffin as Clare

FunFact: Bob Clarkâ€™s Black Christmas is widely acknowledged as the origin of the modern slasher film.

Original title: Black Christmas (1974)
